property.value:
EXTRA COST: You may pick a location.
When this card enters play, if you picked a location as part of its extra cost, X is its structure. Destroy it and deal X damage to its controller's faction.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Pick a faction.
Inflict 3 damage to it. If you deployed another non-resource card this turn, put this card into its owner's hand instead of their discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: When a player deploys a tactic, inflict 3 damage to that player's faction.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your turn, inflict 1 damage to all other characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only characters with at least X strength can block this card, where X is this card's strength.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Pick a character or faction.
Inflict 3 damage to the character or faction.

property.name: Text
property.value:
When this card enters play, you may pick an item. If you do, destroy that item and your faction loses 2 influence.
FLY AWAY
COST: Remove an item in an opponent's discard pile from the game.
EFFECT: Flip this card face-down under its owner's control.
FLIP UP: 3 [R][R]

property.name: Text
property.value: This character cannot block.

property.name: Text
property.value: Inflict 2 damage to all characters.

property.name: Text
property.value:
AGGRO
When this card enters play, if an opponent's faction lost influence this turn you may inflict 2 damage to that faction and pick a character that opponent controls. If you do, inflict 2 damage to it.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Characters with a token on them cannot block this card.
If a character enters play under your opponent's control, you may pay 1. If you do, put a token on it.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Destroy a character you own. Pick a character your opponent owns.
Inflict 5 damage to the character. If the character was destroyed by that damage, draw a card.
FLIP UP: 1 [R]

property.name: Text
property.value: Destroy all non-resource cards.

property.name: Text
property.value:
PROVIDES [R]
FIRE UP
COST: Use this only while this card is a face-down resource. Reveal this card. Pay 2.
EFFECT: Put this card into play face-up. X is the number of characters that were destroyed this turn. Each faction loses X influence.

property.name: Text
property.value:
FIRE!
COST: Pay 1. Pick a location.
EFFECT: Inflict 1 damage to the location.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card cannot be blocked by parties of less than 2 members.

property.name: Text
property.value:
UNIQUE WATCHTOWER
When a character enters play under an opponent's control, inflict 1 damage to it.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card or another resource enters play under your control, name [E] icon or [D] icon. X is the named icon. This turn, this card gains “PROVIDES ­ X".

property.value: When this card or another resource enters play under your control, name [O] icon or [G] icon. X is the named icon. This turn, this card gains “PROVIDES ­ X".
